1337440.name: Solenars Edge II: Aurora of The Seventh Dawn- Armeida Tactics
1337440.description:
This is a free Mini-Game that comes with Solenars Edge II: Aurora of The Seventh Dawn.
*It is located within the base game's folder and does not need to be installed/enabled.*

It's a tiny game with a turn-based SRPG combat system and features 8 playable characters to chose from.

**Disclaimer: If you enable this DLC, only this DLC will work and the base game won't launch.
So, turn it off for both games to work as intended.

This DLC will be removed from the Steam Store in the future due to this issue. Regardless Armeida Tactics
is still operational within Solenars Edge II: Aurora of The Seventh Dawn.
